price: Na tukawaokoa walio amini na wakawa wanamcha-mngu.
footnotes: Na tukawaokoa kutokana na adhabu hii wale walio amini, na wakawa wanamcha Mwenyezi Mungu na wanaiogopa adhabu yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
